documentation.text: @dev The DaiProxy is a proxy contract of Controller that allows users to immediately sell borrowed yDai for Dai, and to sell Dai at pool rates to repay YDai debt.
@dev The constructor links ControllerDai to vat, pot, controller and pool.
@dev Safe casting from uint256 to uint128
@dev The DaiProxy is a proxy contract of Controller that allows users to immediately sell borrowed yDai for Dai, and to sell Dai at pool rates to repay YDai debt.
@dev The constructor links ControllerDai to vat, pot, controller and pool.
@dev Safe casting from uint256 to uint128

devdoc.details: The DaiProxy is a proxy contract of Controller that allows users to immediately sell borrowed yDai for Dai, and to sell Dai at pool rates to repay YDai debt.

borrowDaiForMaximumYDai(bytes32,uint256,.details: Borrow yDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, for a maximum yDai debt. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(controllerDai.address)`.

params.daiToBorrow: Exact amount of Dai that should be obtained.
params.maximumYDai: Maximum amount of YDai to borrow.
params.to: Wallet to send the resulting Dai to.

borrowMinimumDaiForCollateral(bytes32,ui.details: Borrow yDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, if a minimum amount of Dai can be obtained such. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(controllerDai.address)`.

params.minimumDaiToBorrow: Minimum amount of Dai that should be borrowed.
params.to: Wallet to sent the resulting Dai to.

constructor.details: The constructor links ControllerDai to vat, pot, controller and pool.

repayMinimumYDaiDebtForDai(bytes32,uint2.details: Repay an amount of yDai debt in Controller using a given amount of Dai exchanged for yDai at pool rates, with a minimum of yDai debt required to be paid. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(controllerDai.address)`.

params.minimumYDaiRepayment: Minimum amount of yDai debt to repay.
params.repaymentInDai: Exact amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.
params.to: Yield Vault to repay yDai debt for.

repayYDaiDebtForMaximumDai(bytes32,uint2.details: Repay an amount of yDai debt in Controller using Dai exchanged for yDai at pool rates, up to a maximum amount of Dai spent. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(controllerDai.address)`.

params.maximumRepaymentInDai: Maximum amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.
params.to: Yield Vault to repay yDai debt for.
params.yDaiRepayment: Amount of yDai debt to repay.
